title: Mirror of Germany. No. 085 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Berlin Wall, Berlin, Germany, 1961-1989
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: A four-masted barque used as a training ship; the Altona Museum, Hamburg, and its exhibits on fishing and shipbuilding; an international beach sailing week; aerobatics at the Furstenfeldbruck air display; the Frankfurt Motor Show; German synthetic fibres; photographing at birth for identity records; a transition year between school and work; the university town of Tubingen; a touring theatre; the new Berlin Opera; the wall between East and West Berlin.
